attributes.action: Regulate the use of artificial grass
attributes.additional_details: I think this is important in the protection of animal habits and ecosystems. It will also reduce the amount of artificial grass that inevitably ends up in land fill.
attributes.background: I would like regulations to be introduced to limit the amount of artificial grass being used in both industry and the community.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577436
